about_the_game:
Space Station Escape is a simple find-the-difference game.
Players take on the role of an astronaut wanting to escape from a spaceship running out of oxygen.

Don't overlook any anomalies.
If you find anomalies, turn left immediately.
If you don't find anomalies, turn right immediately.

Press SHIFT or RB to GO UP
Press CTRL or LB to GO DOWN

To go out from Station.

STORY


You are an astronaut stuck on a space station. The station's corridor is a loop with two turns, left and right.
You must quickly escape the corridor and choose the correct path before running out of reserve oxygen.
However, this corridor is an endless maze; if you encounter something unusual, turn left; if everything seems normal, turn right at the exit.

FEATURES

  • Experience zero-gravity states in the spaceship.
  • Your oxygen will deplete quickly, and you will lose if you do not choose an exit path swiftly.
  • Simple, easy-to-control gameplay.
  • You can also respawn after running out of oxygen.

WHAT AWAITS YOU BEYOND SPACE?

Hurry and escape the dangerous corridor and wait for your team to rescue you before it's too late.

name: Space Station Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.

short_description: Space Station Escape is a anomaly horror game.Players take on the role of an astronaut wanting to escape from a spaceship running out of oxygen.
